summary.para: Requests the date the image was last modified. This method allows the Shell to determine whether cached images are out-of-date.

param.name: pDateStamp
param.para: A pointer to a structure used to return the last time the image was modified.

returns.para: Return S_OK if successful, or a COM-defined error code otherwise.

remarks.para: Implement IExtractImage2 to provide date stamps for your thumbnail images.
You do not call this interface directly. IExtractImage2 is used by the operating system only when it has confirmed that your application is aware of this interface.
IExtractImage2 implements all the methods as well as IUnknown. The listed method is specific to IExtractImage2.
